nodes.text: Calderos Station was an Imperial space station located in the galaxy's Mid Rim that served as a deep-space waypoint. Due to local Imperial travel restrictions, ships traveling to or from certain worlds, such as Wobani, were required to pass through the station. In 3 BBY, the station was attacked by the rebellion in order to cover up rebel shipping to their outpost on the planet Crait. Returning from a diplomatic mission to Wobani, Leia Organa witnessed the damaged station.
